Html:
I don't care about bitmatrixes and QrCode objects,

I want to take a piece of text like a URL, and get a bitmap.

I saw a cool youtube that had like 4 lines of code, but the perfect line was something like

bitmap bmp=QrCode.Render(textstring);

Is there a way - in less than 30 lines, to do this?
Create extension method with common setting. Then you can call it in one lines of code to create something.

Silverlancer wrote:
Create extension method with common setting. Then you can call it in one lines of code to create something.
ok great. How do I get from the stupid bit matrix to an image?

http://qrcodenet.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=WriteableBitmapRenderer&referringTitle=Renderer

http://qrcodenet.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=DrawingBrushRenderer&referringTitle=Renderer

Scroll to bottom, there is example there.
